Xiao-Ming Wu (伍晓鸣)

M.S. Student, ISEE laboratory

Computer Science, School of Computer Science and Engineering

Sun Yet-Sen University


Email: wuxiaoming.alg@gmail.com

Biography

I am currently a master student at Sun Yet-Sen University. As a graduate student, I follow Professor Wei-Shi Zheng and mainly work on computer vision and network compression.
During my undergraduate study in Shandong University, I worked with Assistant Professor Xin Luo and mainly worked on hashing retrieval.

Research Interest

  • Machine Learning
  • Computer Vision
  • Information Retrieval

Publication

Represented works will be highlight.

  • Online Enhanced Semantic Hashing Towards Effective and Efficient Retrieval for Streaming Multi-Modal Data. [PDF]
    Xiao-Ming Wu, Xin Luo, Yu-Wei Zhan, Chen-Lu Ding, Zhen-Duo Chen, Xin-Shun Xu.
    In: AAAI, 2022
  • Discrete Online Cross-Modal Hashing. [PDF]
    Yu-Wei Zhan, Yong-Xin Wang, Yu Sun, Xiao-Ming Wu, Xin Luo*, and Xin-Shun Xu.
    In: Pattern Recognition(PR), 2021

Award

  • National Scholarship, 2019, 2021.
  • First Prize, Academic Scholarship of Shandong University, 2019, 2020, 2021.
